menu.name: Button
menu.description: Button component is used to trigger an action or event.

menu.name: Checkbox
menu.description: Checkbox component is used to select one or more options.

menu.name: Hyperlink
menu.description: Hyperlink component is used to navigate to a different page or section.

menu.name: Json
menu.description: JSON component is used to display JSON data in a formatted way.

menu.name: Toggle
menu.description: Toggle component is used to switch between two states.

menu.name: Radio-Button
menu.description: Radio Button component is used to select one option from a list.

menu.name: TextArea
menu.description: TextArea component is used to enter multiple lines of text.

menu.name: Input
menu.description: Input component is used to enter a single line of text.

menu.name: Hero
menu.description: Hero component is used to display a hero image with a title and description.

menu.name: Card
menu.description: Card component is used to display content in a card layout.

menu.name: Tab-Panel
menu.description: Tab Panel component is used to display content in a tab layout.

menu.name: Accordion
menu.description: Accordion component is used to display content in an accordion layout.

menu.name: Toolbar
menu.description: Toolbar component is used to display a toolbar with buttons and actions.

menu.name: List
menu.description: List component is used to display a list of items.

menu.name: Menu
menu.description: Menu component is used to display a list of items in a menu layout.

menu.name: Dialog
menu.description: Dialog component is used to display a dialog box with content.
